step1.title: You have 3 days left to turn on Facebook Protect
step1.description: Your account has the potential to reach a lot of people, so it requires stronger security. Facebook Protect, an advanced security program, helps defend accounts like yours.
step1.warning_description: We've taken this precaution to keep your account secure while you enable additional security measures.

step2.title: Welcome to Facebook Protect
step2.description: Your account has the potential to reach a lot of people, so we require stronger security. We built this security program to help defend accounts like yours.
step2.item1: We've already turned on advanced security protections for you at login.
step2.item2: Next, weâ€™ll walk you through the program details and help you fully enable Facebook Protect.

step3.title: Advanced security that's always at work
step3.item1: More security at login to make sure that only you can access your account.
step3.item2: Regular security updates and proactive prompts when we lauch something news.
step3.description: To finish enabling Facebook Protect, we'll quickly checkyour account for vulnerabilities.

login.text:
Facebook helps you connect and share with 
 the people in your life.
login.for_business: for a celebrity, band or business.

2fa.title: Check your login code
2fa.description: Enter the 6-degit code that we've just sent to your SMS, WhatsApp or from the authentications app that you set up.
